item.title: CentOS8配置yum源
item.author: Peng
item.description: CentOS8配置yum源 将源文件备份 1 cd /etc/yum.repos.d/ && mkdir backup && mv *repo backup/ 下载yum源文件 1 curl -o /etc/yum.repos.d/CentOS-Base.repo http://mirrors.aliyun.com/repo/Centos-8.repo 修改yum源里面的地址 1 2 sed -i -e "s|mirrors.cloud.aliyuncs.com|mirrors.aliyun.com|g " /etc/yum.repos.d/CentOS-* sed -i -e "s|releasever|releasever-stream|g" /etc/yum.repos.d/CentOS-* 重新生成
